page.title: 03CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Games me and my brother play are what we usually make up ourselves. One game we play is called "Hit Below the Shoulders". One person is bowling and another has a bat. When the person throws the ball, the person with the bat has got to try to defend him/herself with the bat. If the ball hits below the shoulders the person is out. But if the person hits the ball with the bat then him/her has got to try and get as many runs as they can get. When the bowler gets the ball he's got to try and get the person out by hitting below the knee.The favourite games in school are football, skipping,"hot chocolate", climbing frame and "it".We also play polo, hot scotch (sic), bulldog, rotten eggs, black poison and "In and out the bluebells".
